problem.choiceresponse:
Which of the following message IDs can be used to refer to the first message in a stream when using XRANGE? Choose two or more answers: The special character '-' The partial message ID '0' The full message ID ' 0-1' The empty message ID ""
Explanation
“-” is a special character representing the first ID in the stream. “0” is the lowest possible timestamp, so will also represent the first ID in the stream. “0-1” is the lowest possible complete identifier, again representing the first ID in the stream.
